mapper.insert: -- into 表格 bean字段 对应 数据库字段 insert into t_post (post_name,post_type,post_salary) values ({#post_name},{#post_type},{#post_salary});
mapper.delete: -- or 是同时判断并满足条件 delete from t_post where post_name = #{post_name};
mapper.update: -- where 是写数据库内的元数据，set 后面字段是需要改成什么样的数据 update t_post set post_name = {#post_name},post_type = {#post_type}, post_salary = {#post_salary} where post_salary = {#post_salary} and post_education_requirements = {#post_education_requirements};
mapper.select: -- 字段是bean内的，where bean字段对应数据库字段 select * from t_post where post_name={#post_name} and post_type={#post_type} and post_salary={#post_salary};
